title: Welcome
text: You're in command of a stranded sub. The crew must gather and repair critical systems so you can surface

title: The Crew
text: Each crew member has a health bar, and stats that effect how they work

title: Assign a Crew Member
text: Assign a crew member to a repair a task: open the "Assign" select on a task and choose a crew.

title: Assign a Crew Member Quickly
text: Use Quick to auto-assign the healthiest available crew.

title: Open Upgrades Panel
text: You can buy upgrades for each crew member. Crew members can get stronger with upgrades, which makes repairs faster.

title: Manage Upgrades
text: Click Upgrades on a crew's card to purchase levels.

title: Manage Supplies
text: Upgrades cost supplies, and you can earn supplies by successfully completing tasks

title: Use Medic â€” Request Heal
text: Request a Medic to heal a wounded crew member. Click Heal on a crew card to have the Medic start healing.

title: Wrap Up
text: That's the quick tour! You can replay this tutorial anytime. Press Finish to close the tutorial.
